emotions.description: All human emotional states and feelings

euphoria.definition: Intense state of pleasure and well-being

serenity.definition: State of calm and peaceful tranquility

tranquility.definition: Quality of being calm and peaceful

frustration.definition: Feeling of being blocked or helpless

dread.definition: Great fear of something in the future

melancholy.definition: Pensive sadness with no obvious cause

depression.definition: Persistent feeling of sadness and hopelessness

bittersweet.definition: Mixed feeling of happiness and sadness

jealousy.definition: Fear of losing something to a rival

interest.definition: Feeling of wanting to know more

hope.definition: Expectation and desire for positive outcome

walk.definition: Move at regular pace on foot

jump.definition: Push off ground into the air

gray.definition: Achromatic color between white and black

sun.definition: Star at center of solar system

since.definition: From time in past to now

reality.definition: State of things as they are
